title: LeaveBuster
body: Im going into my game and my computer decided to restart it self and now im in LeaveBuster and took 20 Lp Riot Please Help.Today is my Birthday and this happen what a great birthday present from riot a LeaveBuster for 5 game Thank Riot. Please Please Help. Can you please help me get rid of this Please

replies.body: As much as I'd like to grant your wish on your birthday, removing lower priority is just not something we do.  The only way to get rid of Leaverbuster penalties is to play consistently without interruptions.  I'd like to help resolve whatever is causing you to leave games, but I'll need more information on what's happening exactly and when.  Error messages or anything can help!
Can you lower it like the time or return my lp back It say error messages .
